QuestData.Title: He Was My Student
QuestData.Description:
Uther's memories of this Prince Arthas haunt him deeply. He is the reason Uther's soul was fragmented, why Devos fell the way she did.
The pain in these memories is palpable.
We have to dig deeper. Uther must face the source of this darkness.
Once again, you need to enter his past to protect his future.
QuestData.LogDescription: Aid Uther in reliving his second memory.
